source.content: We stand w/ our Canadian partners as scene unfolds in Ottawa. We stand resolute in defense of our 2 nations.First responders in our thoughts

comment.content: @NoradNorthcom we thank you for keeping the USA and #Canada safe right now as we sit in #Michigan 20 minutes frm Canadian border
@NoradNorthcom @HomefrontHugs thank you my friends to the south !
@NoradNorthcom Have you raised alert status or not? Reports conflict! Thank you. Will forward response to readers
